The unwind has only just begun. I don't know a lot about it. Just what i see. Notice who was green all day yesterday? and who went red. CME was stronger than any. The volume was thru the roof om cme. I think it is just getting started. My opinion

Topic.Title: What the better BUY here- GOOG or AAPL ?? ANy thgoughts

Message.Msg: The best stock to buy is MU. DRAM price is surging for the near future. MU could easily go to $25 a share. Almost double from here. GOOG and AAPL cannot match that. This is the only stock that can survive the coming correction. AAPL is the best stock to short as institutions want to download their shares bought in 2011 and 2012. AAPL total cap will be 200 to 300 billion dollars like INTC or MSFT eventually. They also have an incompetent CEO. GOOG still has some upside potential but you have to buy on the dip. Can't buy high and sell higher.

Topic.Title: Goog closing $885

Message.Msg: GOOG is a wild one. Last week it dropped 4 points in the last 10 minutes on Friday. I had sold 875 puts & was sweating until the last second. It closed at 875.04, but I still got 300 shares exercised. Fortunately for me, GOOG was 880 on premarket Monday, so I netted ~$1500 in addition to the premium. Total profit: $2100+. This week, not so good. I closed out my position early this morning & sucked it up. I had bought calls. Big mistake. So much for GOOG mirroring the Dow. Not.
